description:
A mad scientist and his hoard of undead guard their territory within the gothic halls. Outside an ominous sky of thunder, rain and lightning blankets the surrounding woods.

Once again, youâ€™ll have to craft, fight and scheme your way to freedom from this eerie supernatural slammer.

Featuring:
- A brand-new horror themed map to escape from
- New Halloween themed customisations
- New items and craftable recipes

Your goal is to escape at all costs!
name: The Escapists 2 - Wicked Ward
